mapper.select: SELECT CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT FROM CLUB
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB (CLUB_NUM, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_INFO, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_PHONE, CLUB_PHOTO, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, STATUS) VALUES (CLUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clubName}, #{clubPresident}, #{clubInfo}, #{clubLevel}, #{clubLocation}, #{clubPhone}, #{clubPhoto}, #{clubStoredPhoto}, '보류')
mapper.select: SELECT club_num, club_name, club_info, club_president, TO_CHAR(club_regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD') club_regdate, club_membercount, club_photo, club_storedPhoto FROM club WHERE club_num = #{clubNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM CLUB
SELECT m.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM CLUB c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.CLUB_PRESIDENT = m.MEMBER_NAME WHERE c.CLUB_NUM = #{clubNum}
SELECT CLUB_NUM, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_INFO, CLUB_PHOTO, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_PHONE, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL FROM CLUB ORDER BY CLUB_NUM DESC
